circumstances: Ricky Smith, age 30, was reported missing from his home at 54 Nethergate South, Crail. Known for his regular routine involving medical appointments and a yoga class, Ricky's disappearance was uncharacteristic and unexpected. Prior to going missing, Ricky mentioned to his aunt, Amanda Smith, that he had planned to visit the train station for an undetermined purpose. His absence was first noticed when he failed to attend his workplace meeting, which was unusual for him. Concerned, his sister, Sandra Smith, reached out to authorities. After extensive searches, Ricky was eventually located by police at an address in Crail, safe and unharmed. The circumstances of his disappearance remained unclear, but there was relief in his safe return.
